ComicInfo.Summary:
A special 3 year anniversary issue with story and art by series creator Dan Mendoza. Featuring. The. Most. Shocking. Revelation. Yet!
Presenting 3 regular and risqué variants, including two covers from series creator Dan Mendoza (DollFace)!!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Dan Mendoza | 1 | B | Risqué Cover, Limited to 2500 | Dan Mendoza | 2 | C | "Blood Tub" Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Marco Maccagni | 3 | D | Risqué "Blood Tub" Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Marco Maccagni | 4 | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Renzo Rodriguez | 5 | F | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Renzo Rodriguez | 6 | G | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Dan Mendoza | 7 | H | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Dan Mendoza | 8 |
